author: Nashville Tennessean, Jason Gonzales, Nashville Tennessean
title: How to homeschool during coronavirus quarantine: Moms, teachers share ideas, advice
description: As families are asked to stay home to slow the spread of coronavirus, parents are forced into a homeschooling role. Full-time homeschoolers have tips.
content:
Reviewed editor-in-chief David Kender shares creative ways to keep your kids engaged while you're stuck at home.
USA TODAY
When it comes to homeschooling, every moment is a chance for a lesson to Megan Miller.
